thread.title: Karbonn launches Titanium S200 at Rs 4,999
thread.title_full: Karbonn launches Titanium S200 at Rs 4,999 | Business Standard News

author: BS Web Team
title: Karbonn launches Titanium S200 at Rs 4,999
text:
Indian smartphone maker Karbonn launched their new smartphone Titanium S200 on Tuesday. The dual phone is priced at Rs 4,999 and is available exclusively on Snapdeal.com.  
The Titanium S200 has 5 inch display and a 2600 mAH battery. The rear camera is 8 mega pixel (mp) with dual LED flash and front camera is 3.2 mp. The phone has 1.2 Ghz quad core processor, 1 GB RAM and 8 GB internal memory.  
It also offer 21 Indian keyboard languages and 5 Indian UI languages giving users the freedom to interact in their local language.  
“We have partnered exclusively with Snapdeal for Titanium SD200 HD to offer easy access and buying options to our consumers.” said Shashin Devsare, Executive Director, Karbonn Mobiles.  
Specifications  Operating system: Android  Display: 5-inch  Processor: 1.2 Ghz Quad core; 1 GB RAM  Storage: 8 GB  Camera: 8 MP primary; 3.2 MP secondary  Battery:  2,600 mAh
